resources.string:
Control Freak by shane87 @ xda-developers.com
 Tweaking utility for OverClocking Samsung Galaxy S phones running Gingerbread
 Has been designed for use with the Captivate, running a ported i9000 kernel + rom
 Specifically designed around existz's Talon kernel
 If you are using a different kernel, some features MAY NOT WORK!!

 May work on other Galaxy S phones, but HAS NOT BEEN TESTED!!
 Requires proper kernel installed!!

 For more info go to XDA.
 A HUGE thank you to the following:
 existz @ xda-developers.com
 y3ttr @ xda-developers.com
 kodos96 @ xda-developers.com
 xan @ xda-developers.com
 And to anyone who uses this app, especially if you leave feedback!!
You are running a incompatible kernel. To to get one head to XDA
Your device is not rooted or you have not accepted superuser prompt. To accept launch it again. More information on XDA.
Tick the frequencies you want to be used.

This item allows you to select a way to organize an I/O (input/output) queue. Suggested: noop (simplest, less overhead) or BFQ (CFQ if not supported in kernel). Doesn\'t seem to have large impact on performance.
This item allows you to limit max clock to specific value. The processor wont run faster, even with higher states selected.
Select the desired CPU Threshold settings. These settings affect how your CPU decides when to scale the speed up or down, and has an effect on performance and battery life

The selected Governor decides when and how to scale your cpu speed up or down. Different governors cause the cpu to behave differently, and therefore have an enormous impact on system stability, speed, and battery consumption.

The recommended governor is interactive or ondemand, unless you are running FroYo, then ONLY use conservative, as no other governor plays nice with FroYo!

For more info, see xda.
Here you will find advanced tweaks for your selected Governor. If you don\'t know what these values do, LEAVE THEM ALONE!
